message:
Somehow, but ai has become much more responsive to instructions. On the one hand, this is good, but now you will have to be very careful with Reminder Note, because Reminder is written right before each message, and ai uses reminder more than memory. The best way out is to simply delete Reminder Note and leave it empty, transfer all the info to Lore. I did this a long time ago and have no complaints.
---
updated :Verified_animated: https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=(1.4)Blonde-Ghost-Lady's_bots~82269cce0694204c998a19498b67c242.gz
